author: Special Correspondent
text: Chennupati Kodanda Ramaiah, Dean, School of Media and Communication at the Pondicherry Central University has been nominated for inclusion in ‘Marquis Who’s Who in the World’ which is a revered biographic reference standard in the world. The nomination is for the 2014 edition of the Marquis Who’s Who. The Marquis Who’s Who in the World is the standard for reliable and comprehensive biographical data in the world published since 1899.
title: Varsity Dean nominated for ‘Marquis Who’s Who’
